A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’ve waited to put this up\, especially as there’s a lot of negativity about this film. I’ve read the original empire strikes back reviews and they go along a similar vein. It’s too long. That’s my biggest criticism\, but apart from that\, it’s a great film. Sure it’s a similar story to before (rag tag band of revels fire a big nasty empire)\, but this is clearly trying to make a leap away from this\, ready for something different. I thought Luke was especially well done.
